title: Microsoft to Buy Activision Blizzard; Deal for $68.7 billion including net cash; Bobby Kotick will remain CEO of videogame maker after acquisition
text:
*Microsoft Says to Acquire Activision Blizzard for $68.7 Billion Including Net Cash

*Microsoft to Pay $95 a Share for Activision Blizzard

*Microsoft: Bobby Kotick Will Remain Activision Blizzard CEO After Acquisition

More to follow

Microsoft Corp. is nearing a deal to buy Activision Blizzard Inc. for more than $50 billion, in its largest acquisition by far, to grab a video-game heavyweight that has been roiled by claims of workplace misconduct.

Write to Cara Lombardo at cara.lombardo@wsj.com, Kirsten Grind at kirsten.grind@wsj.com and Aaron Tilley at aaron.tilley@wsj.com

Microsoft to Buy Activision Blizzard
